name: POST - S - Stopping
Consider fire stopping between layers of lining & apply compound(s) as specified
Openings/penetrations/corners & bulkheads, correctly formed (consider tolerances where applicable)
Consider square stopping, slimlines, joints checked & acceptable
Correct compound(s) used to align with consented specifications
Adequate drying time between coats, no visible bubbling/deforms & each coat is sanded as applicable
Light check completed to ensure no sheet joins stand out
Stopping work completed - specified level of finish achieved
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
POST - S - Painting
Any prep work & sealer coat completed
Light inspection completed and approved to continue
Any additional prep work completed (stopping, filling, sanding etc)
First top coat completed
Additional top coat applications completed
Final coat completed as per specifications
Painting work completed - specified level of finish achieved
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
